inn1.comm: left the ball outside off stump
left the ball harmlessly as it goes outside off again
outside the off stump and left again
he leans forward to defend the ball outside off, but it shapes away a bit and thick edge goes past the slips for four
comes down the track and smashes it straight to mid off
length delivery outside the off stump, defends on the off side
back of length outside off, defends it to point
short of length outside off, extra bounce surprises him and thick outside edge goes to third man for one
outside the leg stump, tucked down to fine leg for one off the pads, leg bye
on length now outside off and shaping it away form the batsman who lets it go
beaten! Closer to the batsman, the angle brought the ball in, Anamul defended, but the ball held its line after pitching and nearly got the outside edge
short ball going towards the leg side, he hooks and a top edge goes down leg for a one-bounce four!
slightly short of length outside off, Tamim stretches forward and defends it
swing and a miss! Wider outside off, shaping away too, Tamim went for a drive but missed it
outswing from outside the off stump after it pitched on length, left alone
shorter and a touch wider outside off, Tamim keeps his bat behind the pad and leaves again
keeps low this time after pitching outside off and swinging away, left easily
closer to the batsman outside off, leans forward and defends it to the covers
back of length outside off, good bounce till the keeper as it's left alone
touch closer to the off stump, left alone again
on length outside the off stump, Anamul shoulders arms again
short and wide, Anamul cuts, it's in the air and in the gap for four! He went on his toes to get on top of the ball and cut it square past backward point
towards middle and leg now, pushed down to mid on, no time for a single
fuller on the stumps, Anamul blocks it back
length delivery around off, Tamim defends it back
touch shorter on the middle stump, tucked to the leg side for two in the gap
too wide this time outside off, Tamim drives and it goes down to third man for one
towards the off stump on length, Anamul defends and thick inside edge goes to leg
just outside off on length, he blocks it back
towards off stump now, he defends it down to mid on with soft hands and takes a quick single
defends the length delivery towards short cover, wants a quick single but he's sent back by Tamim. It was too risky
fuller and wider, Anamul doesn't move much to drive and misses!
short of length delivery is defended to short cover, he's sent back for the single again
back of length outside off, pushes hard at it and it flies down to third man
fullish outside off, defends it softly on off and takes a quick single
towards the stumps now, Anamul works it on the leg side past backward square leg for two
wider outside off with the angle, Tamim flashes hard on the off side and Sibanda dives at point to save four runs
charges down this time, strikes it hard again but can't clear extra cover
angled in from outside off, Tamim defends it with soft hands towards short cover for another quick single
takes a step towards off stump and tucks the ball to leg by closing the face of the bat, for one
back of length outside off, there's enough room for Tamim to open up is arms and cut it square off the back foot past backward point for a cracking four
towards the leg side this time, off the pad towards square leg for one
outside the off stump on length, pushed to cover off the front foot
on length and angled across outside off, left alone
fuller and wider, Tamim goes down on a knee and swings his arms, thick outside edge goes to third man for four. Third man was very square
still pretty wide and slightly full, driven late to third man for one
loud appeal for lbw as the ball shaped in sharply from outside off, Anamul tried to work it on leg but was struck just outside the off stump
beaten! Angles it in, Anamul plays for the angle but the ball held its line a bit to beat him
length delivery on middle and leg, pushed to short midwicket
fullish on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
flatter and quicker on off stump, pushed down past the bowler towards mid off for a quick single
flat and short of length outside off, pushed down to long off for one
short of length outside leg, wants to tuck it on leg but takes it on the pad
fullish on the leg stump, tucked off the pads to deep square leg for one
inside edge nearly hits the stumps! It was angled across outside off, Tamim looked to cut and inside edge went between him and the stumps
towards the stumps now, Tamim flicks it to the leg side by leaning towards the ball and finds the gap for four. Chigumbura chased and made a slide to cut it in, but failed
outside off on length, pushed into the covers
back of length on off stump, guides it late to third man for one
shapes it in from outside off, Anamul leaves it alone
beaten outside off! Shaped it in from back of length, he poked and missed
flattish outside off, Tamim drives and gets an inside edge on leg
fuller outside off, pushed with the angle to deep cover for one
slides the flat delivery towards leg and it hits the pads
length delivery on the stumps, blocked back
tossed up outside off, pushed down past the bowler to mid off
full out outside off again, drives it down to long off for one
fullish on the stumps, driven down to long on for one
flighted outside off, Tamim leans forward and blocks
goes back for the delivery around off, tucked on the leg side
stretches forward and inside edge goes to backward square leg
shorter and wider outside off, guides it to backward point
flighted on middle and leg, clipped against the turn towards midwicket for one
flighted and full on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
outside off on length, pushed down to long off for one
short of length well outside off, chopped off the back foot to point
fullish on the stumps, pushed down to long on for one
short and flat angled across off, he leans froward and blocks
flat on the stumps again, pushed back to the bowler
flighted and slightly short outside off, Anamul goes back to let it turn and guides it behind square for two
flatter towards the leg side, Anamul can't get it away
flighted on length just outside off, defends it to the leg side
shorter and turning in from outside off, Anamul gets a leading edge towards silly mid on, lands safe and they take one
too short and wide, cuts off the back foot to deep cover for one
turning in from off towards the batsman, tucked to fine leg for one
comes down the track and defends it back
length delivery outside off, pushed on the off side
shorter outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
on the off stump now, pushed back to the bowler again
touch wider outside off, pushed down to long off for one
shorter anf angled across, Tamim cuts it late towards third man for two
turning in from off stump, he goes back and tucks it to leg for one
short and wide outside off, sliced off the back foot to deep point
shortish outside off and turning in, guides it late to short third man
fuller outside off, tucked with the turn towards mid on
short and sliding down leg, swatted to short fine leg, there's a fumble but they don't run
turning in from outside off, goes back and pushes to short cover
towards middle and leg on length, pushed down to long for one
makes room to drive, Kamungozi chases him with the ball, inside edge goes to leg for one
stretches forward to block the ball back outside off
outside off again, he drives but doesn't middle and they sneak in a quick one
flat and down leg past the batsman for a wide
slower an sliding towards leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
slower towards leg, helped to fine leg with the angle for one
flighted and full outside off, Anamul swings his arms and lofts it over the covers in the gap for four
turning in from outside off, he drives again and gets an inside edge to leg behind square
length delivery outside off, pushed down to the bowler
flighted full toss outside off, swatted to sweeper cover for one
fuller outside off, tucked to the leg side with the turn
makes room for the turning ball and pushes it to cover
bit of flight outside off, he defends it back
towards middle and leg, pushed down to mid on for one
flighted just outside off, steered down to long on with the turn
leans forward for the length ball outside off, inside edge goes to leg side
shorter and quicker outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick single
flighted and turning in, tucked to fine leg for one. Time for drinks
full and wide, driven behind square on the off side in the gap for two
leans forward a bit and defends it back from outside off
flighted and full outside off, digs it out on the off side
shorter and closer to off stump, pushed down to long on
full and wide, Tamim frees his arms with a drive and finds point
shorter outside the off stump, Tamim waits for it and taps it late behind square on off
flighted around off stump, defends it to leg with a forward lean
flighted towards leg now, he sweeps and it goes off the pad towards square leg
on the stumps and pushed down to long on for one
too short and turning in, pulled off the back foot to fine leg
comes down and defends the ball to midwicket by taking it on the full
shorter and wider, Tamim doesn't moves his feet much and only taps it late after the turn to beat short third man and finds four!
full outside off, pushed down to long off for one
short on the stumps, pulled off the back foot to long on. He didn't quite middle that
flattish outside off, driven through the covers for one more
outside off on length, pushed to cover
looks to defend outside off, but is beaten by turn and bounce
closer to the stumps and it's pushed down to long on for one
angled in from length outside off, Tamim blocks it back
flighted around off now, Tamim leans forward and finds the inside edge to the leg side
outside leg this time and it's swept to fine leg for one
short outside off, turning in and it kept low, pushed down to long on
flighted delivery on length on off, stretches forward and blocks
comes down the track and that's gone all the way! He took it on the full from middle stump, long on was wide and he hit it straight down the ground to bring up his fifty
flattish on off stump, clipped to midwicket
outside off now, pushed into the covers and Sibands runs to stop it
makes room, Sibanda pitches it short and he cuts it to cover point
slides it down the leg side for a wide
fuller on off, eased down to long on for one
well outside off on length, pushed off the front foot to cover
shorter outside off, he goes back and chops it to point
length delivery outside off, defends it back
worked to fine leg off the back foot with the turn for one
flighted outside off, drives it down to long off
tucks the length delivery outside off to midwicket
fuller towards the pads, helped to short fine leg
comes down and defends the incoming delivery to midwicket
angled in a little bit, tucked to the leg side with a forward lean for one
flattish and turning in towards the stumps, pushed to midwicket
fuller on the pads, eased down to long on
fullish on the stumps, drives it down to long off for one more
flat and angled in towards the pads, clipped to midwicket
fullish on the stumps, pushed down to long on
comes down the track, Nyumbu pitches it short down leg and Anamul gets into awkward position to push it on leg
short of length outside off, punched to cover point
fullish on the pads, flicked down to long on for one
wide outside off, driven off the front foot towards deep point
comes down and takes it on the pad outside off
flighted on leg, tucked off the pads to leg for one
short of length outside off, he goes back and swats it wide of long on for two
outside off now, chops it to backward deep point
too full and wide, Anamul eyes the gap and pierces it with a cover drive off the front foot for four. That's his fifty
leans forward a bit and turns the ball to leg for one
slightly full outside off, pushes it back
short and wide outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
fullish on the stumps, chipped down to long on
flattish on the stumps, defends it back
shorter and wider, he makes room to steer it to extra cover
on length around off, pushes it back on off
loud lbw appeal as Tamim looks to sweep the ball from leg stump, misses and it goes off the arm on off. Umpire gives it as runs, not leg bye
dropped! Anamul came down to smash it, Kamungozi pitched it flat, Anamul still went ahead with his shot and it went high towards point, where Mire ran backwards but could not hold on to it
turns it down the leg side for a wide
short outside off, he taps it late to short third man
comes down and unleashes a drive inside out against the spin to find the gap or four. He took it on the full and lofted it in the gap
on length towards middle and leg, tucked between the bowler and midwicket for one
shorter and flatter outside off, Anamul chases and misses
Anamul comes down this time and lofts it for six! Mid off was inside the circle, took it nearly on the full outside off and took the aerial route for a six
turning in a bit from outside off, tucked to the leg side for one
charges down to drive and finds midwicket
fullish outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick single, chance for a run out but they take a single with the overthrow
towards middle and leg, clipped to backward square leg for one
full and wide outside off, enough room for Tamim to swing his arms fully and find the gap through the covers for four!
charges down, smashes it down to long off, it's going for four by Panyangara runs from long off and dives to his left to save three runs. Excellent effort near the boundary
flatter outside off, pushed down to long on for one
slightly slow outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick single and a no ball for overstepping. although replays show some part of the heel might have been behind the crease
fullish outside off, Tamim goes down on a knee to heave but misses
short of length on the pads, eased down to long on for one
back of length and angled in, tucked to midwicket for one
fullish on the stumps, pushed down to long off for one
short ball just outside off, he goes across to pull it towards square leg for two
slower and shorter outside off, Anamul waits for it and taps it late to guide it past short third man cleverly and collects four
slightly slow and full on leg, pushed down to long on
slower delivery around off on length, tucked with soft hands towards long on and Chatara runs all the way to keep it to one
short of length outside off, tapped to short third man
in the block hole on off, blocks it towards short cover for one
short and wide, Anamul keeps it down and finds short third man

appeal for run out at the bowler's end! It was a poor delivery down leg, Tamim pulled and found square leg, where there's a fumble and they go for the run, but Tamim did not give it his all while running. Replays show he's fallen short and Tamim falls on the last ball of the Powerplay as it's a direct hit!

Shakib gone first ball, the crowd is stunned! Sibanda bowled from round the wicket, it was short of length outside off but coming in with the angle, Shakib went back to turn it to leg but the ball sneaked through and went under the bat to just hit the top of off stump!
shorter of length outside off, tucked to leg off the back foot
fullish outside off, pushed into the covers
down the leg side this time for a wide
full outside off again, eased down to long off for one
shorter on the stumps, tucked off the back foot to backward square leg
on middle stump, worked off the back foot to square leg again
brings it in with the angle from short of length outside off, Anamul defends off the back foot
touch wider outside off, pushed into the covers for one
short and wide, tapped off the back foot to point where Sibanda's dive saves a couple of runs
slightly slower and around off, defends it back to the bowler
fuller on the stumps, pushed down to long on for one
brings it in sharply from outside off, he defends it back
angled in towards the batsman, clipped to leg for one
fuller on off, pushed straight to midwicket
makes room for this one outside off and punches it down to long off
too short and turning in, Mushy rocks back and pulls it to the midwicket boundary for four!
fullish on the off stump, clipped straight to midwicket
flatter and turning towards leg, tucked to square leg for one and that's drinks
short ball angled in, pulled to deep square leg for one

that's a stunner from Sibanda! Short and wide delivery outside off, Anamul cuts fiercely towards point where Sibanda leaps to his right in the air and catches it! Panyangara does a little jig in celebration
back of length outside off, Sabbir defends it close to himself on off

oh one more, Bangladesh are crumbling here! Another short ball gets a wicket - this one came in, Sabbir pulled it late and holed out to the fine leg fielder to find Kamungozi who had to adjust a bit but took it easily eventually
angled in towards the stumps, clipped to fine leg along the ground for one
back of length towards the stumps, defends on the leg side off the back foot
short of length around off, tucked towards square leg for one
the short ball is pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket for one
strays down the leg side for a wide
sower outside off, he leans forward and tucks it to square leg
flighted outside off, cuts it off the back foot to point
turning in towards middle and leg, defends it with the turn on leg
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
fullish outside off, pushed into the covers
drifting in this time, driven down the ground for one
angled in from short of length, defends it off the back foot
shorter on the stumps, steered to deep midwicket for one
turning away from outside off, looks to push into the covers but gets an inside edge
another edge as he closes the face of the bat to leg, edge goes to point
fullish outside off, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he leans forward and blocks it
sways down leg and it's helped to short fine leg for one
flighted on length outside off, pushed to leg with the turn
slightly flatter and turning in from outside off, he defends off the back foot
full toss on leg, pushed back to the bowler who dives and stops it
full on the stumps, driven down to long on for one
charges down the track for an inside out drive and just clears point with a slice, Mire runs to the boundary and saves one
angled in towards the stumps, clipped behind square on leg
slower and shorter outside off, guides it late to short third man where Taylor dives
outside off, he defends it back to the bowler
coming into the batsman, pushes it back off the back foot and no run again
turns it down leg for a wide
turning in from outside off, helped towards backward square leg
stretches forward and finds midwicket
turning in from outside off, clipped to the leg side for one
short and wide outside off, Mushy rocks back to cut it fiercely but misses
charges down the track and breaks some shackles with a six! It was on length but he took it on the ful by coming down and lofted it straight down the ground
turning in from around off, pushed back to the bowler
down the leg side and he pulls it along the angle to beat fine leg for four. Poor delivery and put away easily
back of length outside off, he stays back and defends it
moves across the off stump and works the ball to the leg side with the angle, that's the 200 for the team
short of length outside off, he taps it late between point and third man in the gap for two
angled in towards the stumps, turned to the leg side behind square with the wrists
fullish well outside off, he swings and misses

comes down the track and lofts it high in the air, hardly any power behind the shot and that's a very good catch at long off from Panyangara. Mahmudullah took it on the full and chipped it down the ground, high enough to give Panyangara time to run in and dive forward

that's one more, Mushfiqur falls too! He was trying the reverse sweep for the short of length ball that was coming in from outside off, he missed it and the ball struck him in front of off stump. Loud appeal and up goes the finger
slides it in towards the batsman, clipped to midwicket
fullish on leg stump, tucked to midwicket where a misfield gives them a run
bit of flight outside off, turned to the leg side off the back foot for one
sliding in towards middle and leg, pushed to the leg side
fullish outside off, pushed down to mid off where a fumble allows them a run
goes through! It was short of length and coming in from outside off, Mashrafe looked to defend but the bat came down late and that went just over the stumps
flicks the ball from the stumps to short fine leg, that's a direct hit at the keeper's end but Mominul ran well to reach safely
length delivery outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short ball this time and that's pulled off the back too to deep midwicket where Mire runs to his right and dives to save two runs
close chance - direct hit at bowler's end would have made it close! Mominul pushed the low full toss down to mid off but the fielder did not hit the stumps
fullish outside off, swishes it to deep backward point in the gap for three, excellent running
angled in towards middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket where a fumble from Mire allows them to come back
back of length outside off, defends with soft hands into the covers for a quick single
charges down and swishes at the ball outside off to find point
oh that's a misfield from Raza and it goes for four! The full toss was swatted to the wide long on boundary where Raza had to slide to his right but the ball deflected off him to the boundary
outside the off stump, pushed down to mid off
fullish slower delivery on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
slow again, this time outside off, cut to point at the edge of the circle
short outside off, taps it in the air towards third man for one
short of length outside off, steered between backward point and third man, only for one

that one keeps a bit low and hits the off stump! It was a slower delivery too, coming in from outside off, Mortaza tried to heave it on leg, missed it completely and the ball didn't miss the off stump
angled into the pads, he wants to flick but gets a leg bye on the off side
well outside the off stump, he swings and misses
quick, cheeky single as he digs out the full delivery towards the covers and gets off the mark. Direct hit at the keeper's end would have sent him back
fullish outside off, tapped to backward point off the back foot
charges down the track, but it's too wide on the off side
comes down again and drives the ball to mid off
full and wide outside off, steered to third man for one
dances down for a drive through the covers, Chigumbura dives at extra cover to keep it to one
pulls the short ball straight to midwicket for one
slower delivery is full outside off, slogged down to long on for one
makes room for the widish delivery outside off, drives it with power over backward point and finds two
comes down, Chatara bowls into him but Mominul whips the ball off his body to the square leg boundary for four this time
on the other side this time, four more! Made room and charged down, took it on the full outside off and pierced the gap in the covers for four. Two fielders chased but were beaten by the ball
wide outside off and it's left alone for another wide
comes down and steers the yorker to third man for one and keeps strike
low full toss is heaved to deep midwicket for one
full and outside off, driven back and the bowler dives to stop the ball
direct hit at the keeper's end, they are appealing! The full ball was tapped on the off side and the bowler hit the stumps but Mominul was quick to make his ground
shuffles way across towards the off side, Panyangara chases him with a full delivery outside off and he flicks it to leg for one
full and wide outside off, driven to deep cover for one
comes down the track for the full delivery, Mominul punches it down to long on. They are coming back for the second and a really wayward throw means they get it easily

inn2.comm: length ball angling in towards off stump, defended towards mid-on
down the leg side now, and Masakadza can't connect with the attempted glance
another length ball, straightish line on middle and off, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, punched crisply to short cover
length ball on off stump, angling in. Masakadza punches it to mid-on
ooh. It's fullish outside off, it was the slower ball, he goes for the drive on the up and inside-edges it past his leg stump.

gone! This was another of those slower balls outside off, and it kept a little low as he went for the checked drive into the covers. Played with an angled bat, and it came in off the pitch, took his inside edge, and crashed into the stumps
back of a length, angling down the leg side, and Raza shuffles out of the way
back of a length, angling in towards middle stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length, a bit of width, and again it keeps a little low. Raza punches towards point, and he has to crouch at his knees in order to play the shot

angled in towards middle and leg and Raza is a little late on his shot but manages to tuck it away to deep backward square leg. He had shuffled across his crease and was right in front if that had hit him on the pads
fullish outside off stump. Raza comes forward and throws his hands at the ball, lofting it over extra cover
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, left alone
angling in towards leg stump, back of a length, and Sibanda is hit on the thigh as he hops up, looking to work it into the leg side
back of a length outside off, and that carries through at shoulder height to the keeper after Sibanda shapes to cut before deciding to leave the ball
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, and Sibanda stays beside the line of the ball and punches it firmly between point and short extra cover
back of a length, and this keeps low again. Stays in the crease, looking to push it into the off side, and has to adjust to jam his bat down and block it into the on side
what a shot that is! That was a length ball outside off, and he got down on one knee as if Mashrafe was an offspinner, and smashed it over the midwicket boundary
back of a length, angling in towards middle and leg and cramping Sibanda for room. He squeezes it away towards short midwicket
down the track, and Raza slaps this hard but straight to cover point
back of a length on the pads, and he can't connect with the glance, and it runs off his thigh towards the keeper
back of a length outside off and he lets it come on and dabs it away with an open face to third man
back of a length, comes in towards off stump, and Raza blocks it off the back foot to short extra cover
short, and that sits up, and Raza rocks back, opens up, and swivels his hips through a powerful pull in front of square, nearly hits the boundary rope on the full, just bounced inside
fuller now, and he gets a good stride forward to push that to short cover
a touch too straight and he clips it off his pads to deep backward square leg
back of a length outside off, and he shuffles across and tucks it away wristily towards short midwicket
another slower ball and he gets a huge stride out to defend into the covers
back of a length, a touch of width outside off, and Raza jumps in the air to punch that firmly to point
back of a length again, and he looks to punch once more and ends up slicing it to third man, off the outside half of his bat. A bit of extra bounce this time
length ball on off stump. He stays in his crease and blocks it into the off side
short ball to start with, and he pulls it away towards deep square leg, getting into a prancing position with upraised front leg
short again, down the leg side, terrible ball considering fine leg was inside the circle, and he shuffles across and simply helps it away to the left of that fielder
short again, wide outside off. He doesn't go hard at it, looks to dab it away towards third man, and the ball beats his outside edge
back of a length, angling in towards middle stump, defended off the back foot
short again, and he's pulled it away dismissively to the midwicket boundary. More a short-arm jab than a pull, and he timed that very well, rolling his wrists over at the top of the bounce
another short ball, pulled again, a little too early into his shot and he ends up playing a tennis-style forehand to mid-on
slower ball outside off. Raza stays deep in his crease and tries to steer it to third man. Can't beat backward point
back of a length outside off, looked like another offcutter. Raza shuffles across and works it to short midwicket
slower short ball outside off. Raza goes for the pull and the ball sneaks under his bat
back of a length, a touch too straight, and he tucks it off his hips to deep backward square leg
back of a length, angling in towards off. Sibanda had thrust his front foot out even before the bowler released and he simply clubbed it away to the midwicket boundary
bowled him! Another ball keeps low, and he was looking to go back and across to defend, ended up in an ungainly crouch after the ball sneaked under his bat and left his stumps in a mess
short, a bit of width, and point has to dive full-length to his left to stop that open-faced steer from Raza
tossed up, angled in towards off stump, and he comes forward to push it back to the bowler
a touch wider and he gets forward to defend into the off side
makes some room now, not quite driving length, and he has to reach out a little to push that into the covers
skips down the pitch now, drives inside-out to long-off
nice and slow, angling in towards off. Raza presses forward to defend
back of a length, angling in towards off, defended back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and off. Shuffles across and nurdles it into the on side

gone! Mashrafe picks up his third. It's short, angling in, and he closes his bat face to work it into the leg side. It straightened, and the leading edge popped up in the air and Mahmudullah took an excellent catch, running backwards and to his left from short cover and diving full-length at the end
length ball angling in towards off. Presses forward and defends into the covers
back of a length outside off, punched to point off the back foot
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, punched into the covers
length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot
a little fuller now, outside off, and he presses forward to drive firmly to short cover
angled in towards middle stump now and Taylor is at full stretch to defend into the on side
this one goes with the arm and Taylor's bat comes down at an angle to defend, and he gets a thick inside edge that runs away into the square leg region
tossed up outside off, he plays for turn with an angled bat and the ball goes through the gate into the keeper's gloves
a little fuller and he comes forward to block it back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
back of a length on middle stump and he pushed it towards mid-on and called his partner through immediately for the quick single
fullish, wide outside off, left alone
back of a length, doesn't come onto Mire as he looks for the punch. Ends up poking it feebly into the off side
fuller now, angling in towards off, blocked back to the bowler off the front foot
length ball outside off, comes forward and opens his bat face to dab it away to short third man
on the pads, and he clips it away towards square leg for the single
tossed up outside off, pushed into the covers off the front foot
full, angling in towards leg stump, pushed to mid-on with soft hands
a little quicker, angling into middle and off, and he comes forward to block it back to the bowler
angled in once more and he comes forward to nurdle it towards short midwicket
down the track now, and he works it away against the turn to the right of the short midwicket fielder. Nice placement, it was two from the moment he found that gap
angled in towards leg stump, flat and quick, and he comes forward to block down the ground
holds this back a bit outside off and he reaches out to block into the off side
this one's quicker, goes with the arm, and he pushes out to defend outside off and gets an inside edge into the leg side
quickish on leg stump, clipped to short midwicket
slower now, a bit of loop on off stump, and he comes forward to defend into the off side
tossed up, angling in towards off stump, and he presses forward to defend, and Shakib starts with a maiden
tossed up outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
back of a length outside off, goes deep in his crease and punches it down to long-off
fuller now, angling in towards middle and leg, and he comes forward to block into the on side
a bit more air now, and he drives inside-out into the covers
length ball and he comes forward to push it into the covers
gone! Goes for the reverse sweep from outside off, and he ends up gloving it, and it goes off the keeper's shoulder and the man at slip takes a superb overhead catch, diving backwards
back of a length, angles it too far down the leg side, and that's the first run off his bowling
tossed up now, on off stump, driven down to long-off
a bit quicker, on a good length outside off, and he comes forward to defend into the off side
full, angling in towards middle and leg. Keeps his front pad out of the way and defends back to the bowler
on the stumps and he comes forward to defend
a bit of air, and a touch too straight. Chakabva gets his head over the ball and uses his wrists to clip it away towards fine leg
a bit of turn away towards off stump, and he comes forward and defends with the spin towards cover point
goes back to a length ball on middle stump, and isn't behind the line as he pokes at it. Turns away and takes his outside edge down towards third man
tossed up outside off, gets a nice stride out to drive to long-off
full on middle stump, comes forward, stays inside the line, and dabs it towards point
fullish on leg stump, clipped away through square leg
shortish outside off, slapped to cover point
length ball, angling in towards off stump, defended off the front foot back to the bowler
angled in towards off stump, a bit of turn away and he comes forward and steers it backward of point
back of a length on off stump and he makes room to punch but can't beat short cover
a little quicker and fuller and he blocks it back to the bowler
on the pads now and he tucks it away through square leg
beauty. It's angled in with that round-arm action, into a fifth-stump line, and he prods forward to defend and the ball turns away sharply to beat his outside edge
fuller, straighter, defended back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, defended solidly off the back foot
a little fuller, angling in towards off, presses forward to defend back to the bowler

shorter now and he looks to run it down to third man with half a bat. Ball bounces extra and beats his edge, through to Mushfiq who takes it after a bit of a juggle. Pretty confident appeal for caught behind, not given. Didn't look like there was an edge on it
a little fuller, on off stump, defended back down the ground
back of a length, comes in towards off stump, blocked into the on side off the back foot
slower ball on off stump, defended into the off side
tossed up on off stump, defended into the covers
angled in towards middle stump, a bit of turn away, and he gets right forward to smother the spin and block into the off side
a little slower and wider and he goes back to cut, a little too close and it beats his outside edge
tossed up a bit fuller and he gets forward to steer that to point
slower, angled in towards off stump, and he comes forward to block and it turns away and takes his edge, runs away just wide of the diving slip fielder
down the track now, and he looks to drive to long-off but can't beat the diving Shakib
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
goes back to a length ball on the stumps and punches it with the turn past short midwicket
stays back to a fairly full ball on leg stump, punches it down the ground to long-on
back of a length now and he punches it comfortably to the man at long-on
opens up to pull that, stops on him, and he's too early into his shot, is hit on the shoulder

Run-out chance, created by some excellent fielding. It's back of a length outside off, punched into the off side and that's a super stop by Anamul diving to his right at point. Threw to Rubel, who had followed through a few feet down the pitch, he underarms it into the stumps, but Chakabva had regained his crease, as the third umpire confirms
short ball, sits up a bit, and he pulls it away to the man at deep square leg

edged, and that's a difficult chance put down. It straightened outside off and he looked to dab it down to third man. Mushfiqur dived full-length to his right, got his glove to the ball, but couldn't catch it
length ball on middle stump, defended with the angle into the on side
back of a length outside off, slashed towards third man
short, wide, and Chakabva stands tall and cracks it away to the point boundary. That's the first boundary since the seventh over
floated across towards off stump, defended off the front foot
length ball on middle stump, and he tucks it away to the right of short midwicket for the single
back of a length on off stump, punched down to long-on
loopy delivery outside off and Mire frees his arms to launch that over the man at mid-off. Picked his spot well
back of a length on leg stump, punched down the ground to long-on
full outside off, gets forward to punch it back to the bowler
short outside off, keeps a touch low as he looks to pull and he almost chops it onto his stumps. Off the inside edge, just about missed off stump
full outside off and Mire stretches out to dab it into the off side. Again an excellent diving stop from Anamul at point
back of a length outside off, punched into the covers
fuller now, on middle stump, tucked away to the right of short midwicket
back of a length on middle stump, punched down the ground but short midwicket quickly runs to his left to stop the single
full outside off, and Mire gets forward and absolutely creams that over extra cover, a brutal flat-batted hit
big lbw appeal as he goes back to a fairly full ball, trying to work it through the leg side. Skids on with the angle and it hit him outside the line of leg stump
fuller now and he comes forward to work it to short midwicket
back of a length on middle and leg, punched back to the bowler off the back foot
full, down the leg side, clipped away towards square leg
quick and full on off stump, gets on the front foot to defend
fired in full on leg stump, clipped towards deep midwicket
length ball on middle stump, shuffles across and tucks it away towards short fine leg
fullish outside off, comes forward and dabs it to backward point
length ball wide outside off, left alone
fullish outside off, driven towards point, where Anamul, for once, fumbles
back of a length outside off, slower ball, beats the batsman as he tries to run it down to third man, bounces a second time through to the keeper
full outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
length ball on a sixth-stump line, left alone
full on off stump, driven past the diving bowler to long-off, brings up both Zimbabwe's 100 and the 50 partnership
down the leg side, and he plays the sweep, can't get it past short fine leg. Poor ball, got away with giving away just the single
tossed up outside off, driven back hard to the bowler
length ball on leg stump, punched down to long-on
goes back to a length ball on leg stump, works it away past short midwicket
a bit slower, on leg stump, gets forward to drive to long-on
back of a length on middle stump, punched off the back foot towards long-on
shortish outside off, chopped down to third man
back of a length outside off, stopped on the batsman a bit. Looked to punch through the off side, ended up dragging it past the bowler's left hand, nearly a caught and bowled
back of a length on leg stump, punched to short, straight midwicket
length ball outside off, straightens and beats the outside edge as he pushes at it away from his body. A bit of extra bounce too, on that legcutter
fullish on off stump, he pushes it down the ground, playing a little early and hitting it in the air, but it drops down well short of long-on
that looked like a legbreak, it ended up as a full-toss outside off, and Chakabva gratefully slogs it away over midwicket
quicker and flatter on off stump. Makes room to cut but it's too quick for that and he pokes it away towards point
full on off stump, driven down to long-off
long-hop, keeps a bit low as he shapes to pull, and he ends up smacking it down to long-on
full on off stump, driven to short cover
fullish legbreak on leg stump, he looks to work it leg side and it turns away and takes his leading edge, rolls into the off side
length ball outside off, slapped away uppishly to the right of sweeper cover

got him! It was the slower ball outside off, not quite driving length, and it stopped on Chakabva as he pushed forward to drive. Tried to check his shot but ended up scooping it in the air to mid-off. Mashrafe stumbles backwards as he takes the catch but does well to hold on
back of a length on off stump, punched into the covers
another slower ball, and Chigumbura has no idea about it. Pushes at it outside off and it straightens past his outside edge
back of a length on off stump, goes back and across to defend into the off side
full on off stump, driven down to long-on with the full face of the bat
fullish on off stump, went with the arm as he looked to drive through the off side and took his leading edge and rolled into the leg side
angled in towards leg stump and he presses forward to defend into the leg side
goes back to a length ball on middle stump, makes room to punch to sweeper cover
fuller now, on off stump, and he presses forward to defend
angled in with that round-arm action towards leg stump, defended off the front foot
tossed up a bit slower outside off, opens his bat face and steers it to short third man
full, angling in towards off, and it straightens to take his outside edge as he tries to drive towards mid-off. Runs away down to third man
another slower legcutter outside off. Chigumbura pokes at it and comes nowhere near connecting
down the track now, doesn't get to the pitch, and he's beaten again. Looked to prod it away defensively and the ball turned like a legbreak past his edge
a couple of steps down the pitch again and this time he bowls it a bit shorter. Waits for it to come and dabs it away to short third man
short on off stump and he stands tall and punches it away to sweeper cover
down the track again, it's a touch short and Chigumbura waits for it to pitch and jag away, and dabs it away to short third man
tossed up on middle stump. Mire clears his front leg and drives inside-out to long-off
full on off stump, defended into the off side
there's the arm ball. He comes forward and plays outside the line and it goes through the gate and narrowly misses the stumps
down the track now, and he stays inside the line and drives inside-out past short cover. Long-off runs to his left to stop it at the boundary
a touch short and he goes back and makes himself room to slap it away to the left of the man at sweeper cover
back of a length on middle stump. Goes on the back foot to punch it to long-off
length ball on off stump and he comes forward to drive to the left of short cover
full outside off, reaches out and slices it to backward point
nearly. It's short ball, sits up and rises quite high. He has to fetch it from shoulder height outside off, and pulls it uppishly but drops just short of Mominul, diving forward at deep midwicket
length ball outside off, steered away to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, stops on Chigumbura a bit. Waits on it and defends towards mid-off
short ball and this time it's at an amiable waist height. Chigumbura stands tall and pulls authoritatively to the left of deep midwicket. No chance of cutting that off
goes back to the length ball and it goes with the arm. Has to jam his bat down quickly to block it back to the bowler
fuller now, Mire plays a checked drive into the covers
full, angling in towards leg stump, clipped to short midwicket
full and flat on off stump, driven to sweeper cover
full on middle stump, whipped away down to long-on. Was too close to the pitch of the ball, hit it off the bottom of the bat
full and flat, angling in towards middle and leg, driven down to long-on
full outside off and he plays a firm flat-batted drive, straight to short extra cover
back of a length outside off, punches it but once again can't beat short extra cover
straighter now, angling in towards middle stump, and he can only push that straight to short midwicket
full on off stump, and that, finally, is the maiden ODI fifty. Comes forward and pushes it to the left of short midwicket. Well played!
on the pads now and Mashrafe is lucky that Chigumbura's leg glance is directed straight at the short fine leg fielder
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, blocked to short extra cover

taken! Shakib has struck first ball of his new spell. It was tossed up on middle stump and he looked to drive inside-out through cover. It turned and he ended up slicing his drive, uppishly, and Sunny dives to his right at point and takes an excellent low catch
full on middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
full, angled in towards leg stump, blocked towards short midwicket
length ball on off stump, presses forward to defend back to the bowler
big appeal for lbw as this one goes with the arm as he pushes forward to defend. Big inside edge onto front pad
a bit quicker, fairly full outside off, and he comes forward to block towards point. Wicket maiden for Shakib
full outside off, and that is a super shot. Moves his front pad out of the way and creams that drive between cover and short extra cover
short now, and he goes back in a flash and cuts it away forward of point, past the diving cover fielder. Not much width, but he simply got on top of the bounce and cracked that away
this time there is some genuine width, and Chigumbura says thank you and steers it into the gap between point and short third man
and now Mashrafe looks to cramp him for room and overdoes it, slides it down the leg side
length ball on middle and off, he goes back and pushes it with soft hands towards short midwicket
down the leg side once more. Panyangara can't get any bat on that glance but he gets a healthy amount of thigh pad on it, down to the fine leg boundary
fullish on middle stump, clipped to short midwicket
goes back to a length ball that slides on from off towards middle. Makes some room and punches it back to the bowler
length ball on off stump, comes forward and drives to long-off
full, angling in towards off. Comes forward to drive through cover, gets an inside edge that runs away towards short fine leg. Another arm ball, that
a bit slower, it's another arm ball. This time he comes forward but doesn't commit. Waits and defends with bat and pad close together
goes on the back foot now, defends with the angle into the on side
tossed up on off stump, presses forward to defend into the off side
back of a length on middle stump, goes back and whips it away towards long-on
tossed up outside off, driven into the off side and the bowler runs across quickly to stop it
short and wide and that is excellent placement, cut away between point and cover
full on off stump, punched firmly back towards the bowler
full and flat on leg stump, blocked back towards the bowler
a bit slower now and he presses forward to defend, ball beats his inside edge and hits his front pad, but it's sliding down leg
length ball outside off, another slower ball. He comes forward, waits for it to come on, and dabs it towards backward point
back of a length, angling in towards middle stump, clipped away off the back foot into the vacant mid-on region
full on middle and leg, clipped away between long-on and deep midwicket
back of a length on middle stump, and again he goes back and uses his wrists to work it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on. That's three twos in a row

back of a length, angling in towards off stump and straightening, and Chigumbura makes room and opens his bat face at the last moment to dab it away very fine, to the right of the keeper. This is excellent batting.
full on off stump, gets nicely forward to drive to long-off and retain the strike
length ball, goes with the angle towards middle stump. Goes back and makes room to dab it towards backward point
back of a length on leg stump, works it away towards square leg
full on off stump, punched back to the bowler
a little quicker and flatter outside off and he punches it to short extra cover
arm ball and he plays on the back foot. Has to jam his bat down hurriedly to protect his middle stump and poke it away into the covers
back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
length ball on middle stump, defended towards mid-on
length ball, angling in towards middle and leg, defended back to the bowler

that is brilliant fielding! He comes down the track and plays a checked drive towards mid-off and sets off for the single. Sabbir is the fielder and he quickly susses out that the keeper's end is the one to shy to, since Chigumbura was a little late to respond to Panyangara's call. He threw down the stumps direct, and Chiggy was out by a mile.
bouncer to greet him, and he ducks under it, taking his eyes off the ball
back of a length on middle stump and he goes back and across to defend
goes for a sweep to the full ball on leg stump, is hit on the foot
back of a length outside off, and he punches it down to long-off for a single. Only his second scoring shot in 26 balls
dropped full on off stump, looks to drive to long-off and hits it uppishly. Arafat dives to his left but can't hold on.
full again, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and off, goes on the back foot to defend
short ball outside off and he's too early into the pull. Toe-ends it and it loops in the air but drops short of mid-off
fullish outside off and this time he frees his arms and launches it over cover. Sabbir runs back from mid-off to stop it near the boundary
short ball, and Panyangara ducks under it
shortish, rising up into the ribcage and he jumps to get on top of the bounce and works it away towards midwicket
back of a length outside off, straightens and bounces extra to beat the outside edge of his hesitant poke
full on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
bowled him! He's come down the track and it was the arm ball. He looked to defend and it sneaked through the gap between bat and pad and clattered into the stumps
looks to sweep from outside off, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
length ball on off stump, pushed down to long-off
and that's another. Made a lot of room to cut. Was too full for that and it went with the arm and smacked into the middle of leg and middle
looks to fire it in full, slides it down the leg side

and that is that. Kamungozi comes and goes. Arafat finishes with four wickets, three in this over, all bowled. Again he made room to cut, again it was the arm ball, and this one takes off stump. Massive win for Bangladesh, this
